sentences.sContent: Her bridegroom is a handsome young man.
sentences.sContent_eng: Her bridegroom is a handsome young man.
sentences.sCn: 她的新郎是一个英俊的年轻人。

sentences.sContent: She was then plump and shy. I was a strong and happy bridegroom.
sentences.sContent_eng: She was then plump and shy. I was a strong and happy bridegroom.
sentences.sCn: 那时候，她是丰韵又害羞的新娘，而我是强壮又快乐的新郎。

sentences.sContent: Inside this cumbrous and creaking structure, and behind this decayed conductor, the partie carre took their seats - the bride and bridegroom and mr and mrs crick.
sentences.sContent_eng: Inside this cumbrous and creaking structure, and behind this decayed conductor, the partie carre took their seats - the bride and bridegroom and mr and mrs crick.
sentences.sCn: 新郎和新娘，还有克里克先生和克里克太太，一起上了这辆笨重的吱吱作响的马车，坐在这位老朽的赶车夫的后面。

remMethod.val: 美丽的新娘(bride)和帅气的新郎(bridegroom)

trans.tranOther: a man at the time he gets married, or just after he is married
